item.title: CVE-2022-38972|2024-08-03T11:10:31.617Z -- ark-web%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- a-form
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Movable Type plugin A-Form versions prior to 4.1.1 (for Movable Type 7 Series) and versions prior to 3.9.1 (for Movable Type 6 Series) allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.
